extension_desc.message: Automatically change the User-Agent after specified period of time to a random, thus hiding the real one

general_settings_hint.description: Change the behavior of the switcher to best fit your needs:

auto_renew.description: Automatically change the User-Agent after specified period of time

auto_renew_interval.description: Time (in minutes) to automatically update the User-Agent

javascript_protection_enabled.description: Hide real User-Agent from detection by javascript (experemental)

agent_switcher_options_hint.description: Disable Agent Switching when a website matches the following rules (one per line):

exceptions_hint.description: Disable Agent Switching when a website matches the following rules (one per line):

exceptions_description.description: You can use wildcards such as * and ?. * will match any length of characters (e.g. *google.com will match google.com, www.google.com, mail.google.com, etc.), ? will match only a single character (e.g. www.?oogle.com will match www.oogle.com, www.moogle.com, www.google.com, www.woogle.com, etc.)
